sent.orig: But, nope, Doug went along with it.
What are we shooting now? More aluminum? Nope.
sent.trans: 我们现在要射击什么呢？更多的铝？不。

sent.orig: Mom: Nope, you should finish your food in your plate.
sent.trans: 不行，你应该把你盘子里的食物吃完。

sent.orig: Do you find anything wrong with your face or personailty: Nope!
sent.trans: 你有在你的脸上或个性上发现哪里不好吗：没有。

sent.orig: David:2 Nope. This place doesn't have greasy food.
sent.trans: 大卫：不。这个地方不卖油腻的食物。
